Create FirstComponent.vue and import it into App.js

Create the new component in the src/components/ components folder. the component name is FirstComponent.vue and imported into the App.js file:

App.js

<template>
  <div id="app">
    <FirstComponent />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import FirstComponent from "./components/FirstComponent.vue";
export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    FirstComponent,
  },
};
</script>

To add the button to our component we have to use the b-button component of BootstrapVue.Bootstrap‚Äôs v-button is for actions in forms, dialogs, and more.

FirstComponent.js

  <div>
    <b-button pill>Sortoutocde</b-button>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default { 
  name: "FirstComponent",
};
